casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Justin Michael TYSON 253P19-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Justin Michael Tyson, for Tyson, Justin Michael. Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*221The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant for Court to Overturn its Denial of Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of July 2019."
